attributes.action: Introduce punishments for false allegations  reported to the police
attributes.additional_details: To improve mental health and to prevent people from making up false allegations
attributes.background: Punish people for making false allegations and reporting it to the police. It messes up everyone involved mental health and wellbeing, so punishment for reporting false allegations are necessary

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions when the request is something that's already happening.

It's already illegal to give false allegations to the police.
